400.message: The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax

4.message: New password must be at least 8 characters in length, contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one digit, and one special character.

5.message: New password must be at least 8 characters in length.

16.message: There is an active task already.

17.message: Cannot activate this task, because it is scheduled for a future time.

401.message: The request was a legal request, but the server is refusing to respond to it. For use when authentication is possible but has failed or not yet been provided

2.message: Authentication failed to create new session.

5.message: Customers are not allowed to login in Agent Section.

403.message: The request was a legal request, but the server is refusing to respond to it

2.message: User must be agent or admin.

4.message: Agent cannot create a list of employees.

5.message: Agent is not allowed to delete project in share.
Logged in agent cannot access this project.

7.message: Admins cannot be associated with companies.

8.message: User does not have rights to change other user.

9.message: Only admins can edit inactive users.

10.message: Agents cannot change themselves to admin

11.message: User is not allowed to delete.

17.message: There is an on hold task already.

20.message: Provider or token parameter is missing.

404.message: The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future

100.message: The server has received the request headers, and the client should proceed to send the request body

101.message: The requester has asked the server to switch protocols

103.message: Used in the resumable requests proposal to resume aborted PUT or POST requests

200.message: The request is OK (this is the standard response for successful HTTP requests)

201.message: The request has been fulfilled, and a new resource is created

202.message: The request has been accepted for processing, but the processing has not been completed

203.message: The request has been successfully processed, but is returning information that may be from another source

204.message: The request has been successfully processed, but is not returning any content

205.message: The request has been successfully processed, but is not returning any content, and requires that the requester reset the document view

206.message: The server is delivering only part of the resource due to a range header sent by the client

300.message: A link list. The user can select a link and go to that location. Maximum five addresses

301.message: The requested page has moved to a new URL

302.message: The requested page has moved temporarily to a new URL

303.message: The requested page can be found under a different URL

304.message: Indicates the requested page has not been modified since last requested

307.message: The requested page has moved temporarily to a new URL

308.message: Used in the resumable requests proposal to resume aborted PUT or POST requests

405.message: A request was made of a page using a request method not supported by that page

406.message: The server can only generate a response that is not accepted by the client

407.message: The client must first authenticate itself with the proxy

408.message: The server timed out waiting for the request

409.message: The request could not be completed because of a conflict in the request

410.message: The requested page is no longer available

411.message: The "Content-Length" is not defined. The server will not accept the request without it

412.message: The precondition given in the request evaluated to false by the server

413.message: The server will not accept the request, because the request entity is too large

414.message: The server will not accept the request, because the URL is too long. Occurs when you convert a POST request to a GET request with a long query information

415.message: The server will not accept the request, because the media type is not supported

416.message: The client has asked for a portion of the file, but the server cannot supply that portion

417.message: The server cannot meet the requirements of the Expect request-header field

418.message: Any attempt to brew coffee with a teapot should result in the error code "418 I'm a teapot". The resulting entity body MAY be short and stout

421.message: The request was directed at a server that is not able to produce a response (for example because a connection reuse)

422.message: The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors

423.message: The resource that is being accessed is locked

424.message: The request failed due to failure of a previous request (e.g., a PROPPATCH)

426.message: The client should switch to a different protocol such as TLS/1.0, given in the Upgrade header field

428.message: The origin server requires the request to be conditional

429.message: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time. Intended for use with rate limiting schemes

431.message: The server is unwilling to process the request because either an individual header field, or all the header fields collectively, are too large

451.message: A server operator has received a legal demand to deny access to a resource or to a set of resources that includes the requested resource

500.message: An error has occured in a server side script, a no more specific key is suitable

501.message: The server either does not recognize the request method, or it lacks the ability to fulfill the request

502.message: The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and received an invalid response from the upstream server

503.message: The server is currently unavailable (overloaded or down)

504.message: The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and did not receive a timely response from the upstream server

505.message: The server does not support the HTTP protocol version used in the request

511.message: The client needs to authenticate to gain network access
